mapper.select: select a.id, b.typename, a.name, a.personal, a.price from room a, roomtype b where a.type=b.id order by a.id;
select a.id,a.name, a.personal, a.price from room a,roomtype b where a.type=b.id and b.id=#{param1};
select a.id,a.checkin,a.checkout,b.name roomname,a.name,a.mobile,a.howmany,a.howmuch from book a , room b where a.room_id=b.id order by id;
select b.typename from room a, roomtype b where a.type=b.id and a.name=#{param1};
select datediff(checkout,checkin) as checkin from book a ,room b where a.room_id=b.id and b.id=#{param1};
SELECT a.id, a.checkin, a.checkout, b.name AS roomname, a.name, a.mobile, a.howmany, a.howmuch FROM book a JOIN room b ON a.room_id = b.id WHERE a.checkout >= CURDATE() ORDER BY a.checkin;
